pullrequest.title: Fix and improve libfreeimage and libtar detection

content.raw:
[Tinyxml linking seems broken now](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew_bcn-amd64/16/):
~~~
Linking CXX executable gzsdf
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "TiXmlDocument::LoadFile(char const*, TiXmlEncoding)", referenced from:
      _main in gzsdf.cc.o
  "TiXmlDocument::TiXmlDocument()", referenced from:
      _main in gzsdf.cc.o
  "TiXmlNode::~TiXmlNode()", referenced from:
      _main in gzsdf.cc.o
      TiXmlDocument::~TiXmlDocument() in gzsdf.cc.o
      TiXmlDocument::~TiXmlDocument() in gzsdf.cc.o
  "TiXmlDocument::Accept(TiXmlVisitor*) const", referenced from:
      _main in gzsdf.cc.o
  "vtable for TiXmlPrinter", referenced from:
      _main in gzsdf.cc.o
      TiXmlPrinter::~TiXmlPrinter() in gzsdf.cc.o
      TiXmlPrinter::~TiXmlPrinter() in gzsdf.cc.o
  NOTE: a missing vtable usually means the first non-inline virtual member function has no definition.
  "vtable for TiXmlDocument", referenced from:
      _main in gzsdf.cc.o
      TiXmlDocument::~TiXmlDocument() in gzsdf.cc.o
      TiXmlDocument::~TiXmlDocument() in gzsdf.cc.o
  NOTE: a missing vtable usually means the first non-inline virtual member function has no definition.
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
~~~
content.html:
Tinyxml linking seems broken now:

Linking CXX executable gzsdf
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "TiXmlDocument::LoadFile(char const*, TiXmlEncoding)", referenced from:
      _main in gzsdf.cc.o
  "TiXmlDocument::TiXmlDocument()", referenced from:
      _main in gzsdf.cc.o
  "TiXmlNode::~TiXmlNode()", referenced from:
      _main in gzsdf.cc.o
      TiXmlDocument::~TiXmlDocument() in gzsdf.cc.o
      TiXmlDocument::~TiXmlDocument() in gzsdf.cc.o
  "TiXmlDocument::Accept(TiXmlVisitor*) const", referenced from:
      _main in gzsdf.cc.o
  "vtable for TiXmlPrinter", referenced from:
      _main in gzsdf.cc.o
      TiXmlPrinter::~TiXmlPrinter() in gzsdf.cc.o
      TiXmlPrinter::~TiXmlPrinter() in gzsdf.cc.o
  NOTE: a missing vtable usually means the first non-inline virtual member function has no definition.
  "vtable for TiXmlDocument", referenced from:
      _main in gzsdf.cc.o
      TiXmlDocument::~TiXmlDocument() in gzsdf.cc.o
      TiXmlDocument::~TiXmlDocument() in gzsdf.cc.o
  NOTE: a missing vtable usually means the first non-inline virtual member function has no definition.
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
